question:
Which among the following industries and the regions of India is/are correctly matched?
  1. Locomotives - Bangalore
  2. Aircraft - Vishakapatnam 
  3. Ship-building - Tiruchirapalli
Select the correct code from the options given below:
explanation:
Locomotives -  Chittaranjan, Jamshedpur, Varanasi and Bhopal.
Aircraft - Bangalore, Kanpur, Nasik (frames only) Koraput (Engines) and Hyderabad (Electronics).
Ship-building and Repairs -  Vishakapatnam (ship-building) Mazagon Docks of Mumbai, Kidderpore Docks of Kolkata (repairing coastal ships and frigates)
